column2: "The rainbow-colored mist at the Dragon Altar... The dragon soul mist..."
"Eyewitnesses have said that it looks like a collection of Dragonkin souls..."
"It's more like a supernatural phenomenon than a simple atmospheric disturbance..."
"...R-right? If possible, I want you to observe and collect data on that phenomenon."
"I'm sorry for always doing this. As always, I'm counting on you!"
